scripts.irhydra: browserify bench/run.js | indexhtmlify > bench/irhydra.html && /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --no-sandbox --js-flags="--trace-hydrogen --trace-phase=Z --trace-deopt --code-comments --hydrogen-track-positions --redirect-code-traces" bench/irhydra.html
scripts.perf: browserify bench/run.js | indexhtmlify > bench/irhydra.html && /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --no-sandbox --js-flags="--trace-opt --trace-inline --trace-deopt --code-comments --trap-on-deopt" bench/irhydra.html
